TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PageOrientation extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies how pages of content are oriented on print media.

span.span: Specifies how pages of content are oriented on print media.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Los valores de este tipo se utilizan principalmente para estos propósitos:Use the values of this type primarily for these purposes: - Como los miembros de la colección, que es una propiedad de , estos valores indican los tipos de orientación que admite una impresora.As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values indicate the orientation types that a printer supports. - Como el valor de la propiedad de un , el valor indica a la impresora para usar una orientación concreta.As the value of the property of a , the value directs the printer to use a particular orientation. El **desconocido** valor nunca se utiliza en las propiedades de objetos.The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of objects. Nunca debe establecer un propiedad **desconocido**.You should never set a property to **Unknown**. Si algún otro que produce la aplicación ha creado un *documento PrintTicket* que establece la característica orientación en una opción desconocida (es decir, una opción que no está definida en el [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), un objeto en la aplicación que se construye con ese documento tendrá **desconocido** como el valor de la propiedad.If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the orientation feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have **Unknown** as the value of the property. Aunque la y no se puede heredar clases, puede ampliar el [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) para que reconozca las características del dispositivo de impresión que no se abordan de la o clases.Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. Para obtener más información, consulte [NOTINBUILD: Cómo: Extender el esquema de impresión y crear nuevas clases de sistema de impresión](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885).For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar esta enumeración para establecer valores.The following example shows how to use this enumeration to set values. [!code-csharp[XpsPrint#OutputColorAndPageOrientation](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsPrint/CSharp/XpsPrintHelper.cs#outputcolorandpageorientation)] [!code-vb[XpsPrint#OutputColorAndPageOrientation](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsPrint/visualbasic/xpsprinthelper.vb#outputcolorandpageorientation)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PageOrientation Landscape = int32(1)

summary.span: Content of the imageable area is rotated on the page 90 degrees counterclockwise from standard (portrait) orientation.

span.span: Content of the imageable area is rotated on the page 90 degrees counterclockwise from standard (portrait) orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PageOrientation Portrait = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PageOrientation ReverseLandscape = int32(3)

summary.span: Content of the imageable area is rotated on the page 90 degrees clockwise from standard (portrait) orientation.

span.span: Content of the imageable area is rotated on the page 90 degrees clockwise from standard (portrait) orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PageOrientation ReversePortrait = int32(4)

summary.span: Content of the imageable area is upside down relative to standard (portrait) orientation.

span.span: Content of the imageable area is upside down relative to standard (portrait) orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PageOrientation Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
